entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
